name: Paula Csorba Camacho
bio: Poet Paula Camacho lives in Farmingdale, New York, where she moderates the Farmingdale Poetry Group. She has also served on the Committee for a Nassau County Poet Laureate. Her poems have been published in the Farmingdale Observer, Long Island Quarterly, Newsday, the Writers’ Journal, and the anthology Long Island Sounds 2007: An Anthology of Poetry From Maspeth to Montauk and Beyond.
